primary_phone.department: City of Dallas Parking Adjudication Office
primary_phone.purpose: Confirm Phase-1 appeal mailing addresses and issuing authority routing.

sections.canonical_section_name: City of Dallas Parking Adjudication Office
sections.authority_name: City of Dallas Parking Adjudication Office

serves.description: Parking citations issued by the City of Dallas on public streets.

how_to_recognize.notes: Dallas citations include a numeric citation number printed on the ticket.

submission_methods.notes: Administrative hearings may be requested online, by mail, or in person at the Adjudication Office.

confirm_by_phone.purpose: Confirm this is the correct Phase-1 mailing address for Dallas parking citations.

verification.verified_source_note: By-mail request instructions on Dallas City Hall Parking Violations page show mail requests must be sent to City of Dallas Parking Adjudication Office, 2014 Main Street, Dallas, TX 75201-4406 and provide contact phone 214-670-4830【442481854652253†L35-L46】【442481854652253†L59-L63】.

serves.description: Parking citations issued on Dallas/Fort Worth International Airport property.

how_to_recognize.notes: Airport citations often include an alphanumeric identifier and DFW branding.

submission_methods.notes: DFW Airport requires citation contests to be submitted online; customer service is available by phone.

appeal_mail_to.missing_reason: DFW Airport instructs customers to contest parking citations online; no mailing address is provided on the official site.

confirm_by_phone.purpose: Confirm that there is no mail address and verify the online contest process.

verification.verified_source_note: DFW Airport citation page directs users to contest citations online and provides customer service number 866-449-7566; it does not list a mailing address【846139274676953†L139-L149】.

serves.description: Parking citations issued on the Southern Methodist University campus.

how_to_recognize.notes: SMU citations may include a numeric citation number and SMU branding.

submission_methods.notes: Appeals must be submitted via the parking portal within 15 days of citation issuance. Additional documentation may be delivered in person to the Parking and ID Card Services office.

appeal_mail_to.missing_reason: SMU requires appeals to be submitted through an online portal and does not provide a specific mailing address for appeal submissions【6169281522462†L95-L160】.

confirm_by_phone.purpose: Confirm that appeals cannot be mailed and identify the correct procedure for SMU citation appeals.

verification.verified_source_note: SMU appeal guidelines state that appeals must be submitted through the SMU parking portal within 15 days and do not provide a mailing address【6169281522462†L95-L160】.

serves.description: Parking citations issued on the UT Southwestern campus by Parking Services.

how_to_recognize.notes: UT Southwestern citations typically feature a numeric identifier and UT Southwestern branding.

submission_methods.notes: UT Southwestern requires appeals to be submitted electronically via the parking portal; appellants may request to appear in person before the appeals committee【799612999579485†L97-L104】.

appeal_mail_to.missing_reason: UT Southwestern’s Parking Services site instructs that appeals must be submitted electronically; no mailing address is provided for appeals【799612999579485†L97-L104】.

confirm_by_phone.purpose: Confirm that there is no mailing address for appeals and verify the online and in-person appeal process.

verification.verified_source_note: UT Southwestern’s parking citation page states that appeals must be filed electronically and that appellants may appear in person by emailing the appeals committee【799612999579485†L97-L104】.

sections.authority_name: The University of Texas at Dallas

serves.description: Parking citations issued on the UT Dallas campus by Parking & Transportation Services.

how_to_recognize.notes: UT Dallas citations likely include a numeric identifier and UT Dallas branding.

submission_methods.notes: Due to limited information, appeals are believed to be handled through the UT Dallas parking portal.

appeal_mail_to.missing_reason: UT Dallas parking information is not accessible; appeal mailing address is not provided.

confirm_by_phone.purpose: Confirm UT Dallas citation appeal procedures and whether mail appeals are accepted.

verification.verified_source_note: UT Dallas parking site is unavailable (Bad Gateway) and the appeals process cannot be verified; phone confirmation is required.

serves.description: Parking citations issued by the University of Dallas Police Department on campus property.

how_to_recognize.notes: University of Dallas citations have a numeric identifier and UD branding.

submission_methods.notes: Appeals must be submitted via an online ticket appeal form; hearings may be held by appointment【777451738539093†L285-L301】.

appeal_mail_to.missing_reason: University of Dallas requires appeals to be filed through an online ticket appeal form and does not provide a mailing address【777451738539093†L285-L301】.

confirm_by_phone.purpose: Confirm there is no mailing address for appeals and verify appeal procedures.

verification.verified_source_note: University of Dallas parking rules state that citations may be appealed via an online form and do not mention a mailing address【777451738539093†L285-L301】.

serves.description: Citations issued by DART for fare evasion or parking violations in DART-operated facilities.

how_to_recognize.notes: DART citations may include an alphanumeric citation number.

submission_methods.notes: To contest a DART citation, individuals must appear in the justice of the peace court; administrative resolution payments may be mailed but appeals cannot be submitted by mail【790555259445397†L120-L134】.

appeal_mail_to.missing_reason: DART does not offer a mail-based appeal; contested citations require an in-person court appearance【790555259445397†L120-L134】.

confirm_by_phone.purpose: Confirm the appeal process and that there is no mail-in route for contesting DART citations.

verification.verified_source_note: DART's contest information page states that to contest a citation you must appear in person; only administrative resolution payments may be mailed【790555259445397†L120-L134】.

blocking_issues: DFW Airport, SMU, UT Southwestern, UT Dallas, University of Dallas, and DART sections lack confirmed mailing addresses for Phase-1 appeals; confirm or obtain addresses.
known_gaps: Citation number patterns across authorities are speculative with low confidence.
UT Dallas information is unavailable (Bad Gateway) and requires direct confirmation.
Need to verify whether DART issues parking citations and whether any mail submission exists for appeals.
